      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(ArrayList<Card> half)

      Removes the top Card from the Deck of the Player

      causes the Player to take their turn if the Deck is empty the method returns -1 else the method returns the Rank of the Card on top of the Deck

      • Player

        public Player(ArrayList<Card> half)
        Constructs a player that takes the first half of the shuffled deck, and then shuffles again
        Parameters:
        half - passes constructor an ArrayList to be used as that Player's hand

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerDeck

        public ArrayList<Card> getPlayerDeck()
        Returns:
        the ArrayList that represents the Deck that the Player currently possesses to allow for checking the elements in the deck

      • takeTurn

        public int takeTurn()
        causes the Player to take their turn if the Deck is empty the method returns -1 else the method returns the Rank of the Card on top of the Deck
        Returns:
        int to determine if the game continues

      • addWin

        public void addWin(Card c)
        Adds a Card to the Deck of the Player
        Parameters:
        c - the Card to be added to the Player's Deck

        Removes the top Card from the Deck of the Player
